course_description: An interdisciplinary introduction to Latin America and the Caribbean and to the LACS Program at Oxford College. The course provides historical background and familiarizes students with contemporary political, social, economic, and cultural issues.
sections: Class Nbr: 3700, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: P. Palomino, Status: Open
